subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: While a team that is more than 25 games out of first place in its division ranks 10th in attendance in the major leagues, its crosstown rival ranks 24th despite a 70-55 record.
snippet: While a team that is more than 25 games out of first place in its division ranks 10th in attendance in the major leagues, its crosstown rival ranks 24th despite a 70-55 record.
